oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The locusts (with the locust birds which accompany them) are set free by Sorcerers. Stones not to be thrown at the locusts. (L V.-21. 5708-5719 1/2) (L VIII.-31. 8754-8758). |han=kass'o and ||hoaken !khe were told by |han=kass'o's grandfather not to throw stones at locusts. A second part of the story concerns |kaunu who says 'locusts come out' when he wants to drive the locusts with the children.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Throwing stones at locusts
